name: Tabata Intervals
description: High-intensity interval training using the Tabata protocol: 20 seconds maximum effort, 10 seconds rest, repeated for 8 rounds (4 minutes total per exercise)

exercises.name: Tabata Burpees
exercises.description: Full-body explosive movement combining squat, plank, and jump
exercises.instructions: 20s max effort burpees, 10s rest. Repeat 8 times (4 min total). Count total reps.

modifications.easier: Step back instead of jump back, no jump at top
modifications.harder: Add push-up at bottom, tuck jump at top

conditions.knee_moderate: Step back and forward instead of jumping
conditions.shoulder_moderate: Skip push-up portion, focus on squat-jump
conditions.wrist_moderate: Use fists instead of flat palms in plank

exercises.name: Tabata Mountain Climbers
exercises.description: High-intensity core and cardio exercise in plank position
exercises.instructions: 20s maximum speed mountain climbers, 10s rest. Repeat 8 times. Keep hips level.

modifications.easier: Slower pace, hands on bench instead of floor

conditions.shoulder_moderate: Reduce range, focus on form over speed
conditions.lower_back_moderate: Engage core tightly, slow down if form breaks

exercises.name: Tabata Jump Squats
exercises.instructions: 20s max jump squats, 10s rest. Repeat 8 times. Land softly, full squat depth.

modifications.easier: Bodyweight squats (no jump), or half-height jumps

conditions.knee_moderate: Reduce jump height, focus on soft landing
conditions.ankle_moderate: Quarter-height jumps, land on balls of feet

exercises.name: Tabata High Knees
exercises.description: Running in place with maximum knee drive
exercises.instructions: 20s maximum speed high knees, 10s rest. Repeat 8 times. Drive knees to hip height.

modifications.easier: March in place with controlled knee lifts
modifications.harder: Add forward movement, or increase speed

conditions.knee_moderate: Reduce knee height, focus on controlled movement

exercises.name: Tabata Skater Jumps
exercises.description: Lateral power and balance exercise mimicking speed skating
exercises.instructions: 20s max skater jumps, 10s rest. Repeat 8 times. Jump side-to-side, land on single leg.

exercises.name: Tabata Battle Ropes
exercises.description: Upper body cardio with ropes (if available) or shadowboxing alternative
exercises.instructions: 20s max effort waves/punches, 10s rest. Repeat 8 times. If no ropes: fast shadowboxing.

modifications.easier: Slower pace, alternating waves instead of simultaneous
modifications.harder: Add squat or lunge while doing waves
modifications.noEquipment: Fast shadowboxing with jabs and crosses

conditions.shoulder_moderate: Smaller range of motion, controlled pace
conditions.elbow_moderate: Avoid full extension, focus on controlled movement
